message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. Given its value, I think a starting price of $15,000 is fair. What do you think?

I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I'm a bit hesitant to pay $15,000. I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000, which is the maximum I'm willing to pay. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $13,500?
